the.time.is.set.default: Your time zone is set to GMT+2(Default)
command.help:
Subscribe command 
/sto <username> <alias>
or 
/sto <phone> <alias>
, where <username> - is a nick name of your friend in telegram, it has to necessarily start with symbol @, for example: @kricha <alias> - this is a name for a person you know, for you to understand who my report is aboutÑ… <phone> - input phone number in internation format and should necessarily start with symbol + --------------------- to add ONE person - only one command is required, select one that suit you better..
